metadata.name: Neo Adarna
metadata.description:
"Ibong Adarna is a Philippine epic about a legendary bird which is said to be found in Mt. Tabor, where it perches on the shimmering Piedras Platas at night (Piedras Platas is Spanish for silver stones). During the daytime, the bird goes off somewhere but it comes back at night to rest, and it sings beautifully before it sleeps."

Inspired by the Philippine Trogon (Harpactes ardens) modified for the cyberpunk/neon theme

Guhit Pinas x Philippine Web3 Festival entry

3840 x 2160 px

Illustrator x Clip Studio Paint
